description:
Ryuji is Tomoko`s boyfriend in the beginning of the series, but later loses her to the Mega-Playboy, turning him utterly against Junta. Through an odd quirk of events he eventually gains some rather unique abilities. He uses these "powers" to ruin Junta`s reputation... Ryuji is very rich, and lives in an extremely large mansion. He also has several "henchmen" whom he employs to do his dirty work.
From AnimeNfo
name: Sugashita Ryuuji
